revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=MQmaker |model=WiTi Board |revision=v2.0 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price=89 |est_release_date=09/11/2015 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=new |type=wireless embedded board, wireless router, NAS |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128C |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CB256M16BP-D1 |expansion_if_types=SATA 3.0, USB 3.0, Micro SD card slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=2 |jtag=yes,,debug |serial=yes,,debug |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7602EN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7612EN |wi2_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi2_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP1001 |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2-port PCI SATA Serial ATA Controller;ASMedia;ASM1061;;1;,,, CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.3;Ralink UBoot; |stock_os=Linux;3.10.14;OpenWrt (Mediatek SDK); |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, LEDE Project, Padavan (unofficially) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=mt7602e-0000, mt7612e-0000 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.200.1 |default_user=root |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wireless Gigabit Router Board}} :[https://mqmaker.com/product/witi-board/ Product page] The board uses [[MediaTek_MT7621A|MT7621A]] high performance router SoC, supports open source OpenWrt OS.
The board's dimension is relatively small 16cm x 10cm, about three credit cards in a row. *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/mqmaker/witi ''MQmaker WiTi Board'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :See also [https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/witi-board-open-extensible-router-nas-platform ''IndieGOGO'' campaign] ''256MB RAM'' version is also available for $79. '''Note''': According to the [http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ.pdf PCB text] original '''WiTi''' board shipped have a 2.0 revision. :Don't mess with an upcoming '''WiTi2''' board. ===Key features=== :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek_MT7621A|MT7621A]] Dual-Core @880MHz (4 threads) :RAM: 256MB or 512MB (DDR3), Flash: 16MB (SPI NOR) :2.4GHz WiFi (supports 802.11b/g/n, up to 300Mbps) :5GHz WiFi (supports 802.11a/n/ac, up to 867Mbps) :Gigabit WAN port x2, Gigabit LAN port x4 :SATA 3.0 x2 (supports 3.5 inch HDD) :USB 3.0 x1, microSD x1, RTC battery for storage application :30-pin Expansion Ports (including USB, I2S, JTAG, UART, GPIO) :4-pins serial debug port, RF Antenna Connector x4 :Power LED x1, SATA LED x 1, WiFi LED x 2, LAN LED x4 :WPS/GPIO Key x1, Reset Key x1 ==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/08/12/witi-openwrt-router-board-features-6-ethernet-ports-dual-band-wifi-sata-and-usb-3-0-ports-crowdfunding/ ''MQmaker WiTi Board'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/14/witi-router-board-powered-by-mediatek-mt7621a-soc-now-sells-for-79/ ''WiTi Router Board Powered'' on '''CNX-Software'''] ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/ Official support board] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=59092 '''OpenWrt''' board thread] *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/t/how-to-connect-usb-to-serial-uart/140 ''UART'' on '''WiTi''' forum thread] *[https://forum.mqmaker.com/t/alternative-openwrt-mtksdk-build-for-witi-board-wip/272 ''OpenWrt FW'' on '''WiTi''' forums] ===Documentation=== *[http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ-WiTi-Board.pdf Board schematics] *[http://ftp.mqmaker.com/WiTi/Docs/Hardware/MQ.pdf Board layout] ==Images== File:witiboard.jpg|PCB File:ggb0ukplcgdlwthao0dk.png|Interface File:9a91012318d4e6ec8aa694fff13c0cf44f18b90e_1_360x480.jpg|With case File:jbpdjouvxhionze6mlr8.jpg|NAS File:board_1.jpg|PCB hires pt1 File:board_2.jpg|PCB hires pt2 [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
